response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. This exceptional item is valued at $8,000 by both myself and you, ensuring mutual satisfaction. Considering its high quality and unparalleled value, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a significant discount, making it even more accessible and beneficial for your endeavors. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and hope to hear from you soon.", "product_price": 7200}
